Source.Name: libdolbyb
Source.Summary: The libdolbyb project aims to translate dolbybcsoftwaredecode.sf.net into C so that it can be used as a library in SoX_ng.
Source.Description: libdolbyb treats audio recordings to apply or remove something similar to what Dolby B noise reduction codecs in high-end tape recorders do. It translates dolbybcsoftwaredecode.sf.net from Pascal into C giving a generic C library and a command-line tool as well as a new SoX effect.
